snippet: The playwright Thomas Bradshaw talks about “Job” and his other plays, which have impressed some audiences and outraged others.
abstract: Playwright Thomas Bradshaw talks about Job, which runs at the Flea Theater, and his other plays, which have impressed some audiences and outraged others.
lead_paragraph: The playwright Thomas Bradshaw talks about “Job” and his other plays, which have impressed some audiences and outraged others.

headline.seo: Thomas Bradshaw Talks About ‘Job’ and His Other Plays
headline.main: Savoring the Rewards of Button Pushing
